name: Doki Doki Another Round
storyline:
A story of eternal suffering that lives inside us. Will we ever be able to escape it?
The chance to escape that we've always longed for. Will we ever be able to reach it?
Are we stuck here forever?
Time moves forward as the narrator reads. How much time do we have left?
All the answers are in this story. It's up to you to unravel them.
summary: Doki Doki: Another Round is a mod for Doki Doki Literature Club! that delves even deeper into the characters' psyches, exploring themes of memory, reality and the continuous cycle of events. The game challenges the player's perceptions, introducing a darker and more intriguing atmosphere.
